venue.name: CinemaSalem in the East India Mall

item.description:
Just wanted to let you know that Beverly toastmasters is sponsoring a showing of SPEAK, THE MOVIE.  One of the contestants profiled in the movie will be our special guest, and there will be some time to network after the movie. If you are interested in (or afraid of!) public speaking, it's a good take-in. More info: http://cinemasalem.com/movies/speak

You must buy tickets online at cinemasalem or pay at the door. Signing up for the meetup does not get  you a ticket.

I've been swamped but hope to line up some outings now that the nicer weather has arrived. Any ideas, ladies?

Mia

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Aspiring Public Speakers - Screening of SPEAK, the Movie
